weekly picks (Oct 3 week 2022)

Posted on October 17, 2022 in 2022oct,  Daily Shorts

A WordCloud of 2022 Oct 3rd week collection

  1. PhysRevLett.129.170601 Dynamics in Systems with Modulated Symmetries (modulation, PRL)

  2. PhysRevLett.129.177601 Solvable 3D Kondo Lattice Exhibiting Pair Density Wave, Odd-Frequency Pairing, and Order Fractionalization (Kondo instability, PRL)

  3. PhysRevB.106.155414 High-energy Landau levels in graphene beyond nearest-neighbor hopping processes: Corrections to the effective Dirac Hamiltonian (graphene, PRB)

  4. PhysRevB.106.155415 Detection of single phonons via phonon drag in two-dimensional materials (PRB)

  5. PhysRevB.106.165115 Generalized Thouless pumps in $(1+1)$-dimensional interacting fermionic systems (fMPS, PRB)

  6. PhysRevB.106.165417 Phase diagrams and edge-state transitions in graphene with spin-orbit coupling and magnetic and pseudomagnetic fields (graphene, PRB)

  7. PhysRevB.106.L140504 Exotic thermal transitions with spontaneous symmetry breaking (HBOh EGMoon, PRB)

  8. PhysRevB.106.134106 Berezinskii-Kosterlitz-Thouless phases in ultrathin PbTiO3/SrTiO3 superlattices (BKT, PRB)

  9. PhysRevB.106.144417 Diagonal and off-diagonal thermal conduction with resonant phonon scattering in ${\mathrm{Ni}}{3}\mathrm{Te}{\mathrm{O}}{6}$ (JGPark, PRB)

  10. PhysRevB.106.155127 Artificial neural network states for nonadditive systems (machine-learning wave-function, PRB)

  11. PhysRevB.106.155130 Spatial spin-spin correlations of the single-impurity Anderson model with a ferromagnetic bath (PRB)

  12. PhysRevB.106.165304 Spin-orbit coupling and electron scattering in high-quality ${\mathrm{InSb}}{1\ensuremath{-}x}{\mathrm{As}}{x}$ quantum wells (PRB)

  13. PhysRevB.106.L161106 Real-space many-body marker for correlated ${\mathbb{Z}}_{2}$ topological insulators (PRB)

  14. 158 A “Green” Quantum Sensor (Physics)

  15. 2210.07265 Anatomy of Spin and Current Generation from Magnetization Gradients in Topological Insulators and Rashba Metals (Kotetes, arXiv)

  16. 2210.07585 The structure of kagome superconductors AV$_3$Sb$_5$ in the charge density wave states (JPHu, arXiv)

  17. 2210.07633 Emergent Topological Superconductor by Charge Density Wave Transition (arXiv)

  18. 2210.07647 Density functional theory (arXiv)

  19. 2210.07254 Correlated insulating states in carbon nanotubes controlled by magnetic field (nanotube, arXiv)

  20. 2210.07507 Physical properties of the layered $f$-electron van der Waals magnet Ce$_2$Te$_5$ (Ce, arXiv)

  21. 2210.07569 Theory of Energy Dispersion of Chiral Phonon (chiral phonon, arXiv)

  22. 2210.07787 Competing Laughlin state and Wigner crystal in bilayer graphene (arXiv)

  23. 2210.07926 Doping a Wigner-Mott insulator: Electron slush in transition-metal dichalcogenide moir\‘e heterobilayers (arXiv)
